explanation: The given stage direction 'Il heurte Grapinian, qui fait trois ou quatre pas, et se touchant le coude' describes a non-verbal interaction where one character bumps into another. Additionally, there is an implicit description of the character Grapinian's reaction by stepping back and touching his elbow, all of which fall under the category of non-verbal character interaction.
stgdir: Il heurte Grapinian, qui fait trois ou quatre pas, et se touchant le coude.
